about_the_game:
Precision Point VR: The Ultimate SWAT Tactical Experience

Gameplay Overview:

Dynamic Environments:
Delve into a variety of tactical environments ranging from tight, close-quarter rooms and hallways to more expansive urban settings. Each location is crafted with real-world tactics in mind, allowing for cover, flanking, and strategic vantage points.

SWAT Tools & Techniques:

Breach and Clear: Equip yourself with a range of breaching tools to enter secured areas, including battering rams, flashbangs, and explosive charges.
Weapon Customization: Fine-tune your loadout with an array of weapons and attachments. Customize your firearms with scopes, grips, lasers, and more to suit your play style.
Virtual Reality Interactions: Use VR capabilities to peek around corners, manually reload your weapons, and communicate with hand signals.
Modes:

Hostage Rescue: Save innocent lives by strategizing the perfect extraction plan.
Bomb Defusal: Race against time, working with your team to defuse ticking threats.
Team Skirmish: Engage in team-vs-team combat, where strategy and reflexes are key.
AI Challenges:
Face off against AI adversaries designed to challenge even seasoned players. They'll take cover, attempt flanks, and react intelligently to your tactics, providing a constant challenge.

Training Scenarios:
Hone your skills in the SWAT Shooting Range Training Center. From target practice to simulated real-world crisis scenarios, perfect your aim and decision-making in a controlled environment.

Community & Multiplayer:

Communication: Integrated voice chat allows for seamless real-time strategy planning with your team.
Regular Updates: Engage with a dedicated dev team that listens to community feedback, offering regular updates, tweaks, and new content drops.

content_descriptors.notes:
Violence and Gore:
Precision Point VR is a tactical SWAT shooter that includes depictions of gunfights and close-quarters combat. Players will engage in firefights with AI opponents, which can result in blood splatter and other associated visual and audio effects typical of gun violence. There are no overly graphic or gory scenes, but the intensity of the combat might be intense for some users.

Drug and Alcohol Use:
While the core gameplay does not revolve around drug or alcohol use, there might be instances or missions where illegal narcotics or alcohol are depicted as part of the storyline. These elements are incorporated for narrative purposes only and are not glamorized.

Sensitive Topics:
There are no depictions of sexual assault, non-consensual sex, self-harm, or any other explicit sexual content in the game. However, given the nature of SWAT missions, players might encounter scenarios that touch on sensitive issues like hostage situations, threats, and high-stakes standoffs.

Strong Language:
Players can expect occasional strong language, typical of intense situations and reflecting the game's mature setting.

General Advisory:
Precision Point VR is designed to provide an immersive tactical experience, and while it aims to be realistic, all content is purely fictional. Players with sensitivities to any of the topics mentioned should proceed with discretion. Always refer to the game's settings for options to adjust or turn off certain content if needed.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5 6600K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • VR Support: Seated, Standing, Roomscale.Oculus headsets with Oculus Runtime.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: i7 7700k or Higher
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1080 or Higher
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • VR Support: Seated, Standing, Roomscale.Oculus headsets with Oculus Runtime.

short_description: Precision Point VR is a tactical VR shooter focused on close-quarters combat. Execute strategic breaches, rescue hostages, and engage in multiplayer shootouts. Whether you go solo or team up, each decision and bullet counts in this high-stakes SWAT-inspired experience."
